casebody.data:
2002-2618 (La. 10/24/02)

Raoul R. LOZANO, Sr. v. BEEF CONNECTION, INC., Elvin Matte d/b/a the Beef Connection, Rosemarie Caracci, Vincent Caracci and Gloria Caracci d/b/a the Beef Connection and Scottdale Insurance Company. No. 2002-CC-2618. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 24, 2002.

In re Lozano, Raoul R. Sr.; — Plaintiff; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Jefferson, 24th Judicial District Court Div. C, No. 534138; to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, No. 02-C-964.

Denied.
